comments.content: Is there anything similar in opentype perhaps?

[Amadeo](http://web.archive.org/web/20120110023402/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/creative_alliance/amadeo/) and [Fineprint](http://web.archive.org/web/20120110023402/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/creative_alliance/fineprint/) are the closest matches as far as lettershapes are concerned. Can't think of anything close in OT, but I'll have a look.
